name: typescript-plugins-of-mine
description: typescript plugins, test and experiments of cancerberosgx
author: Sebastian Gurin

scripts.build: npx yamat run npm run build
scripts.test-clone: rm -rf ../typescript-plugins-of-mine-test && mkdir ../typescript-plugins-of-mine-test && cd ../typescript-plugins-of-mine-test && git clone ../typescript-plugins-of-mine/.git && cd typescript-plugins-of-mine  && npm install && npm test
scripts.doc: npx yamat run npm run doc
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm i && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat run npm run build && npm run test && npm run doc
scripts.clean-no-doc: find . -name "node_modules" -exec rm -rf '{}' + ; find . -name "package-lock.json" -exec rm -rf '{}' +; find . -name "*.log" -exec rm -rf '{}' +; find . -name "dist" -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.all-no-doc: npm run clean-no-doc && npm i && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat run npm run build && npx yamat run npm test
scripts.all-light: find . -name "dist" -exec rm -rf '{}' + && npm i && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat run npm run build && npx yamat run npm test
scripts.yamat-link: npx yamat link && npx yamat run "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" && npx yamat run "npm i" && npx yamat run "npm run build" && npx yamat run npm test
scripts.yamat-unlink-pack: npx yamat run "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat unlink --version pack && npx yamat run "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat run npm run build && npx yamat run npm run test
scripts.yamat-patch-publish: npx yamat run "npm version patch" && npx yamat unlink && npx yamat --break-on-error no run npm publish
